data.name: EntityLogicalName_Description
data.value: Example: gwm_careerdocument (singular logical name of the table)

data.name: EntityPluralName_Description
data.value: Example: gwm_careerdocuments. This is the plural logical name used in Dataverse Web API URLs.

data.name: FileColumnName_Description
data.value: Logical name of the File column. Example: gwm_attachment

data.name: ViewerHeight_Description
data.value: Height (in pixels) for the preview area. Example: 500

data.name: EnableDownload_Description
data.value: If enabled, users can download the document using the toolbar button.
